title: My Bard Fanart!

embed.description: Love the design of the new League of legends character!

body:
I really enjoy Bard's character design. Totally reminds me of the Ghibli movies(not in a bad way). Right when I saw the official art I knew I had to draw some fanart.

Click on the link for higher res!

P.S Shameless plug, I'm open for commissions. :3

replies.body:
He's gone super saiyan!

Sorry. This is awesome, though!

tell me, why is it that you (as ambassador) have red name.
I have seen green names on regional boards and those were (or so i believe) ambassadors. 

Just curious why is it different here on NA boards

Ah! Didn't see this until just now (I was out of town).

My team is technically the regional embeds, with myself specifically assigned with the writing team. I currently do work with NA, however. Not sure about green names. I only had a red option :3

Seems like no one gave you this choise:

“This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the green name—the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red name—you stay in Riot, and I show you how deep the league hole goes. Remember: all I'm offering is the truth. Nothing more."
Its wonderful! You seem to capture his shape and what not him, and you can't go wrong with this guy! Well done :D

No problem, I wish I could give feedback, but I just don't really see anything wrong with it. Kind of curious about the commissions, but I can't think of anything I'd really need to an extent that I'd pay for it (Not trying to be rude of course, just don't find myself with the need). I'll definitely keep an eye out for other works of yours though :D
No worries, I appreciate the comments. Definitely will be doing more League stuff in the future. :D
I can't not see baymax when I see bard...
